"I'm always receiving notifications from Twitter, even though I've tried to unfollow and mute certain accounts. It's like the app is intentionally trying to drive me crazy."

This post exhibits a stable attributional style because it attributes the cause of receiving notifications to the fact that the app is "intentionally" trying to drive the person crazy, implying that the problem is with the app itself rather than any action or choice made by the person.
